reviewText: Unfortunately this program has never been issued on DVD.  I've talked to Pentrex and they don't plan on doing so.  That's too bad.  I attended this fantastic "Railfair" and it's a must watch for rail fans.  While this is VHS, the video quality and sound is very good for a 'tape'.  Fortunately I was able to move it to the computer, enhance the production and make a DVD thta will last.
